title: Rajkot Foodgrain Prices- October 07, 2019
text:
Rajkot Foodgrain Prices- October 07, 2019

Commodities 34 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 14:10)

© Reuters. Rajkot Foodgrain Prices- October 07, 2019 Rajkot Foodgrain Prices Open- October 07 Oct 07 (Reuters) - Market delivery prices of food grains and pulses at Rajkot in India's western state of Gujarat opened on a mixed trend, traders said Monday. FOOD GRAINS & PULSES * Wheat prices moved up due to low arrivals. * Tuar prices eased due to restricted buying enquiries from mills.
